hero.name: Keltoum Malouki
hero.description: Passionate about creating modern, performant web experiences with cutting-edge technologies

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.description: I'm Keltoum Malouki, a passionate full-stack developer from Casablanca, Morocco. Through my training at YouCode (UM6P), I've acquired solid skills in front-end (React, Next.js, TypeScript) and back-end (Node.js, Laravel, PHP) development. I'm motivated, curious, and always looking for new challenges to improve my technical and interpersonal skills. I love designing modern, creative, and accessible interfaces.
